channel.title: Need Help Getting Server Online!
channel.description: my server wont go online. i can use localhost or 127.0.0.1 to connect to it but no one else can connect to it and idk why. i've even done port forwarding. my compiler works and server works for me but no one else. no-ip is up and i keep runserver up but its still offline for everyone else what do i do!

item.title: Need Help Getting Server Online!
item.dc:creator: @Cortez989 Cortez989
item.description:
@Cortez989 wrote:

it’s running. and in the no-ip box at bottom it says this

[Thu 21:25] Checking Remote IP Address.
[Thu 21:25] Current IP address found, using 67.84.236.83 for updates.
[Thu 21:28] pkerzrcool.no-ip.biz: DNS is current, no update needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Getting Server Online!
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Do you have your No-ip running? And did you check for updates on No-ip?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Getting Server Online!
item.dc:creator: @Cortez989 Cortez989
item.description:
@Cortez989 wrote:

when i put the no-ip that i made it just says error. thats why other people can’t connect to it

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Getting Server Online!
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Did you try putting the No-ip address in the Ip bar in your client? Try that. I am not an expert on getting the server online but try that and see if it works…

Read full topic
